body.p: we are having an awful rain storm and georgeGeorgey is laying on his oars to day i tell him i should pray for rainey rainy days if i was him he is the inspector of the cementing part there has been much trouble about that part of the work the pipes have leaked and made much trouble georges George's work is not hard but dirty as he has to get down in the dich ditch to see to it he sent one man away on his own responcibiltely responsibility as he dident didn't doo do the work good bergenBergen is on that department too)

well walterWalter i got your letter to day with the money and i got the one on the third with the money order i went down to the post office and got the money all very good i had owed amermanAmerman for a barrell barrel of flour for some time so i gave georgeGeorge 10 doll dollars and he paid the balance 16 do dollars was the amount so i feel releived relieved of that debt ammerman Amerman is advertised to sell out and i wanted to pay him before he left and sent the accoun account we remain all about the same as when i last wrote to you walterWalter i think i feel better to day than i have for some time i have been
troubled with the dissiness dizziness in my head but to day i feel intirely entirely free from it have you been troubled with your old complaint walterWalter in your head you say you have had a bad could cold i was in hopes you wouldent wouldn't be troubled with it again maryMary used to be troubled very much with that complaint she says she dont don't have it at all now i asked her what helped her she said hops steemed steamed and put on her face was all that cured her i have not heard from maryMary since she went away nor hannHannah either for all she promised to write often to me i wish she would it would make her feel better i make no doubt i dont don't know what i would doo do if i dident didn't get any letters) i have read the impeachment articles every day i was in hopes it would be carried through without any postponement i never had any idea butlerButler was so smart i suppose the others is smart but he seems to fetch them up so quick) i have not had any letter from jeffJeff or mattyMatty since i wrote to you
